thread.title: BRIEF-Diana Shipping Announces Time Charter Contract For M/V Calipso With Glencore

title: BRIEF-Diana Shipping Announces Time Charter Contract For M/V Calipso With Glencore
text: March 9, 2018 / 2:58 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Diana Shipping Announces Time Charter Contract For M/V Calipso With Glencore Reuters Staff March 9 (Reuters) - Diana Shipping Inc: * DIANA SHIPPING INC. ANNOUNCES TIME CHARTER CONTRACT FOR M/V CALIPSO WITH GLENCORE * DIANA SHIPPING - EMPLOYMENT OF M/V CALIPSO IS ANTICIPATED TO GENERATE ABOUT $5.31 MILLION OF GROSS REVENUE FOR MINIMUM SCHEDULED PERIOD OF TIME CHARTER * DIANA SHIPPING - ‍GROSS CHARTER RATE IS US$12,200/DAY, MINUS A 5% COMMISSION PAID TO THIRD PARTIES, FOR A PERIOD OF ABOUT 15 TO 18 MONTHS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
